WorkItem.Description:
The ProtPala model doesn't seem to be calculating Dodge and Parry and Block correctly as it is not matching the listed Armory Values.
 
Using http://us.battle.net/wow/en/character/malfurion/Rexea/simple as sample gear set:
         Armory  -> RAWR
Dodge: 14.26% -> 14.1472%
Parry: 14.95% -> 14.3484%
Block: 66.54% -> 65.9367%
 
As you can see its as much as 0.6% off (which is a lot when you are talking about block capping!)
 
Can somebody look into this please?
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPala] Dodge, Parry and Block not matching Armory

Comments.Message: Armory shows your stats as if you're fighting against a level 85 mob. Rawr shows those values according to your fight settings, by default they have you fighting a 88 level boss. Hence the 0.6% difference. Dodge differs a little because of the way Windwalk enchant is calculated, you can just "remove" the enchant in Rawr to see your real dodge chance.
